data.prayer: Father, help the stressed and anxious in Cabo Delgado, Mozambique know that you care for them today.
data.verse: Cast your cares on the Lord and he will sustain you; he will never let the righteous be shaken.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Cabo Delgado, Mozambique
data.section_summary: What needs would people have here?

data.prayer: Father, please send new evangelists into the harvest in the state of Cabo Delgado, Mozambique.
data.verse: Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 7 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Lord, we pray for the believers in Cabo Delgado, Mozambique to be more like Jesus in their love for friends and enemies.
data.verse: But I tell you, love your enemies and pray for those who persecute you.

data.prayer: Lord of the Harvest, please send out workers into the the state of Cabo Delgado, Mozambique.
data.verse: Then he said to his disciples, “The harvest is plentiful but the workers are few. Ask the Lord of the harvest, therefore, to send out workers into his harvest field.

data.prayer: Lord we ask you on behalf of the Makonde people. 0.5% are known to be believers. Oh God, please share with them the great gift of your son Jesus and your kingdom.
Spirit, cause the 208,528 believers in Cabo Delgado to obey with immediate, radical, costly obedience, like Abraham.
data.verse: Then God said, “Take your son, your only son, whom you love — Isaac — and go to the region of Moriah. Sacrifice him there as a burnt offering on a mountain I will show you.” Early the next morning Abraham got up and loaded his donkey. He took with him two of his servants and his son Isaac. When he had cut enough wood for the burnt offering, he set out for the place God had told him about.

data.prayer: Lord, you already know the names of the prophets you want to raise up in Cabo Delgado. Please, raise them up and give them the courage to speak your truth to your church.
data.verse: Before I formed you in the womb I knew you, and before you were born I consecrated you; I appointed you a prophet to the nations.

data.section_summary:
the state of Cabo Delgado, Mozambique has a population of 1,583,900.

We estimate Cabo Delgado has 208,528 people who might know Jesus, 621,470 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 753,902 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 7 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, teach the 208,528 believers that their old life is dead and their new life is hid with Christ.
data.verse: For you died, and your life is hidden with Christ in God.
